channel.title: housekeeping on Tianyi as a Developer
channel.description: Recent content in housekeeping on Tianyi as a Developer

item.title: PostSQL Administrative Commands
item.description: User Management Changing Password Edit pg_hba.conf to allow trust authorization temporarily pg_ctl reload to reload the config file Connect and issue ALTER ROLE postgres WITH PASSWORD 'newpassword'; Edit pg_hba.conf again and restore the previous settings; pg_ctl reload again
